subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The Times’s Joe Drape offers commentary on some memorable calls from Tom Durkin, who quit as the voice of the Kentucky Derby, and Larry Collmus, who will replace him.
snippet: The Times’s Joe Drape offers commentary on some memorable calls from Tom Durkin, who quit as the voice of the Kentucky Derby, and Larry Collmus, who will replace him.
